Package gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Components.Cursor

Class Summary
AnnotationJPanel This class is used by the AnnotationOverlay to create an arrow from the region of interest to the annotation.
AnnularCursor This class implements two Rubberband circle cursors for selecting regions.
BoxPanCursor This class implements a translating box cursor for selecting viewable regions.
Circle This class identifies a circular region by a center and radius.
CircleCursor This class implements a Rubberband Circle cursor for selecting regions.
DoubleWedgeCursor This class implements a Rubberband Wedge cursor for selecting regions.
Line This class is a datastructure containing two points that are used to create a line.
LineCursor This class implements a Rubberband line cursor for arrowing an annotation.
PointCursor This class implements a point cursor for selecting regions.
SelectionJPanel This class allows for the drawing of rubber band box/circle/point cursors.
TranslationJPanel This class allows for the drawing of a translating box cursor.
WedgeCursor This class implements a Rubberband Wedge cursor for selecting regions.
XOR_Cursor3pt This class is an abstract base class for cursors that require three points for specification.
XOR_PanCursor This class is an abstract base class for cursors that translate but do not change size.
